info.name: KaspaCom L1 Marketplace API
info.description: API for accessing KRC20 tokens, KRC721 NFTs, KNS domains, trading data, and marketplace statistics on the Kaspa blockchain
info.author: KRCBOT

item.name: Get trade statistics for KRC20 tokens

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (e.g., SLOW, TBDAI)

request.description: Returns aggregated trading data including total volume (USD/KAS), number of trades, and unique buyers/sellers for a specified time frame. Can be filtered by specific ticker.

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (e.g., SLOW)
Filter by specific token ticker (e.g., SLOW)

item.name: Get floor price for KRC20 tokens

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (returns all tokens if omitted)

request.description: Returns the lowest listing price per token across all active orders. Can fetch for a specific ticker or all tokens.

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (returns all tokens if omitted)

response.name: Bad request - unable to process request

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (returns all tokens if omitted)

item.name: Get recently sold/fulfilled orders for KRC20 tokens

request.description: Returns all completed trades within the specified time window (in minutes). Includes order details, prices, and participant addresses.

item.name: Get the most recent sold order

request.description: Returns the single latest completed trade across all KRC20 tokens with full order details.

response.name: Unable to retrieve the completed order

item.name: Get tokens with fastest minting activity

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

request.description: Returns the top 5 tokens with the highest change in mint counts within the specified time interval. Useful for identifying trending tokens.

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

response.name: Unable to process hot mints request

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

item.name: Get comprehensive information about a specific KRC20 token

request.description: Returns detailed token information including supply, holders, trading metrics, market cap, price, and metadata (logo, socials, description).

item.name: Get token logos for KRC20 tokens

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (returns all if omitted)

request.description: Returns logo URLs for tokens. Can fetch a specific token logo or all token logos.

query.description: Filter by specific token ticker (returns all if omitted)
Filter by specific token ticker (returns all if omitted)

item.name: Get tickers with active open orders

request.description: Returns a list of token tickers that currently have active buy or sell orders in the marketplace.

response.name: List of tickers with open orders

item.name: Get recent NFT mints for KRC721 collections

request.description: Returns recently minted NFTs. Can be filtered by specific collection ticker or return all recent mints.
Returns all completed NFT trades within the specified time window (in minutes). Includes order details, prices, and participant addresses.
Returns all active NFT listings available for purchase. Can be filtered by collection ticker.

item.name: Get trade statistics for KRC721 NFT collections

query.description: Filter by specific NFT collection ticker

request.description: Returns aggregated NFT trading data including total volume (USD/KAS), number of trades, and unique participants for a specified time frame.

query.description: Filter by specific NFT collection ticker

response.name: Unable to process trade statistics request

query.description: Filter by specific NFT collection ticker

item.name: Get NFT collections with fastest minting activity

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

request.description: Returns the top 5 NFT collections with the highest change in mint counts within the specified time interval. Useful for identifying trending collections.

response.name: List of hot minting NFT collections

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

response.name: Unable to process hot mints request

query.description: Time interval for measuring mint changes

item.name: Get floor price for KRC721 NFT collections

query.description: Filter by NFT collection ticker (returns all if omitted)

request.description: Returns the lowest listing price for NFTs in a collection. Can fetch for a specific collection or all collections.

query.description: Filter by NFT collection ticker (returns all if omitted)

response.name: Unable to process floor price request

query.description: Filter by NFT collection ticker (returns all if omitted)

item.name: Get filtered NFT tokens with pagination

request.description: Returns NFTs matching the provided filter criteria including collection, owner, listing status, price range, and other attributes. Supports pagination and sorting.

response.name: Filtered NFT tokens with total count

item.name: Get recently sold KNS domain orders

request.description: Returns all completed KNS (Kaspa Name Service) domain trades within the specified time window (in minutes).

response.name: List of sold KNS domain orders

item.name: Get trade statistics for KNS domains

request.description: Returns aggregated KNS domain trading data including total volume (USD/KAS), number of trades, and unique participants for a specified time frame.

item.name: Get currently listed KNS domain orders

request.description: Returns all active KNS (Kaspa Name Service) domain listings available for purchase.

response.name: List of listed KNS domain orders
Unable to retrieve listings for KNS

item.name: Get historical price and volume data for KRC20 tokens

request.description: Returns time-series data with total volume, average price, and trade count per time bucket. Bucket sizes: 5m (15m-1h), 15m (6h), 30m (12h-24h), 2h (7d), 12h (30d), daily (90d-1y). Missing time periods are filled with zero values for consistent chart rendering.

response.name: Bad request - timeFrame and ticker are required
